programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: Barry Allen uses his super speed to change the past, but his attempt to save his family creates a world without superheroes. programme.title: Hulk

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Jan 2025

programme.title: The Cinema List: Musicals
programme.desc: It is time to get musical with this all-singing, all-dancing list of movies. From Wonka to La La Land, get ready to tap your feet along to the beat.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Family, Sport, Lifestyle, Education, Science And Technology ║ 2006 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Sports comedy starring Jack Black. Kindly cook Ignacio concocts a brilliant solution to the financial hardship of the Mexican monastery where he has grown up. programme.title: Bad Neighbours
programme.desc: Comedy starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron. New parents Mac and Kelly Radner have a settled life on a quiet street, but are worried that their friends see them as dull. programme.title: The Meg
programme.sub-title: Action, Thriller, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 2018 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. After failing to save the crew of an imperilled submarine, deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is unfairly branded a drunk and a coward. programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2013 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams and Russell Crowe. In a far away galaxy, as the planet Krypton is about to explode, scientist Jor-El sends his baby son Kal to Earth. programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Period action romance starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh and Zhang Ziyi. programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond

Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? Animated adventure, with the voices of Colm Feore, Harland Williams, Paul Van Dyck and Millie Davis Steve Majaury - Director Andrea Sebastía - Director Harland Williams - Santa / SuperKlaus Colm Feore - Frank Fafnir Millie Davis - Billie Paul Van Dyck - Leo.

When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. Soon she discovers that a power company has been dumping toxic waste and poisoning the residents of a small town. Masry's firm takes up the case - making Brockovich the unlikely linchpin in one of corporate America's biggest ever lawsuits Steven Soderbergh - Director Julia Roberts - Erin Brockovich Albert Finney - Ed Masry Aaron Eckhart - George Marg Helgenberger - Donna Jensen Cherry Jones - Pamela Duncan Peter Coyote - Kurt Potter Scotty Leavenworth - Matthew Gemmenne De La Peña - Katie Erin Brockovich-Ellis - Waitress.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? Animated adventure, with the voices of Colm Feore, Harland Williams, Paul Van Dyck and Millie Davis Steve Majaury - Director Andrea Sebastía - Director Harland Williams - Santa / SuperKlaus Colm Feore - Frank Fafnir Millie Davis - Billie Paul Van Dyck - Leo.

programme.title: Classic F1 Races
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 1987 British Grand Prix from Silverstone. Williams driver Nelson Piquet started on pole ahead of teammate Nigel Mansell and fellow Brazilian Ayrton Senna.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Fletcher
programme.desc: Helen and Sam caught up with former Manchester United and Scotland midfielder Darren Fletcher. Fletch gives the podcast team a fascinating insight into his career and his current and future plans.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Macari
programme.desc: Lou Macari speaks to Helen and Sam about the work he does at his homeless shelter, playing with Best, Law & Charlton, and the heart-wrenching story of why he'll always have a soft spot for Solskjaer.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Scholes
programme.desc: The United Legend talks to the Pod about the heartbreak of missing out on the Champions League Final, his retirement U-turn and those 'mistimed' tackles.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Cantona
programme.desc: The King talks to the Pod about his famous 'seagulls following the trawler' press conference, his unique celebration against Sunderland and the meaning of life.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Saha
programme.desc: The Frenchman opens up about his struggles with injury, Sir Alex reducing him to tears and how he forced through his transfer from Fulham.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Schmeichel
programme.desc: The Great Dane talks to Helen, Maysie and Alex Bruce about his explosive bust-up with Sir Alex, the historic Treble in 1999, and how he regrets leaving the club.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Whiteside
programme.desc: The Pod team set up in Norman's local where he recalls tales with Bryan Robson & Paul McGrath, and takes the guys back to his incredible rise to fame at the age of 17.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Evra
programme.desc: Uncle Pat joins the Pod in a feature-length episode where he tells the emotional story of his route into football - right the way through to retirement, with lots of tears and laughter along the way.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Nani
programme.desc: Former United winger Nani joins the Pod via video chat all the way from Orlando, where they look back on some of the iconic and strange moments in his time at Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Yorke
programme.desc: United Legend Dwight Yorke joins us from his home in Dubai to look back on his incredible career, and how an early childhood car accident may have influenced his outlook on life.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Robin van Persie
programme.desc: RVP talks to the Pod about facing United with Arsenal in that famous 8-2 victory, his joy at finally winning the Premier League, and what it was like to work with Louis van Gaal.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast: Phil Neville
programme.desc: The former United defender looks back on his Premier League career including a flashpoint with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Forlan
programme.desc: The cult hero talks to the Pod about his iconic goals against Liverpool and the time he played without a shirt!

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Rashford
programme.desc: The United and England forward looks back on an incredible year both on and off the pitch. We hear everything from the nerve-wracking penalty in Paris to forcing two UK government U-turns.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Mark Hughes
programme.desc: Sparky walks us through his many successful years at Old Trafford and the thinking behind his decision to manage Man City years later.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Ruud van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: The goalscoring machine looks back on his career; how a move to Old Trafford nearly fell apart, his rivalry with Arsenal, and training with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.
